title: O'Sullivan comeback stuns Ding to set up Higgins quarter-final - highlights & report
description: Seven-time champion Ronnie O'Sullivan launches a stunning comeback from 5-3 down to beat Ding Junhui 6-5 in the first round at the Masters.

title: Trump impeachment: What happens to impeached presidents?
description: Johnson, Nixon and Clinton: Mr Trump follows three US presidents who have already faced impeachment.

title: Covid-19: BBC's Fergal Keane revisits St Mary’s and Charing Cross Hospital 10 months on
description: As the UK records its highest death toll, Fergal Keane has been to see the strain the NHS is under for the second time.

title: Covid-19 and football: Should players be hugging?
description: BBC Sport explores the debate around footballers' celebrations amid tighter coronavirus restrictions in the sport.

title: Covid: Police cancel fine for couple visiting care home
description: Carol and David Richards had been fined £60 for driving 20 minutes to see her mother.

title: Foden strikes as Man City beat Brighton to extend unbeaten run
description: Manchester City extend their unbeaten run to 14 matches in all competitions with a win over struggling Brighton.

title: Trump impeachment: Several Republicans to join Democrats in House vote
description: Some Republicans say they will join Democrats and vote to charge the president with inciting insurrection.

title: Jason & Osi's guide to the NFL play-off divisional games
description: The NFL Show's Jason Bell and Osi Umenyiora guide you through the four divisional play-off matches to be played this weekend.

title: Free school meals: Mother's 'sadness' at 'mean' food parcel
description: Schools will be able to give vouchers rather than food from next week, the education secretary says.

title: Covid: UK reports record 1,564 daily deaths
description: The prime minister warns there is a "very substantial" risk of intensive care being "overtopped".

title: Livingston v Aberdeen postponed 10 minutes after scheduled start because of heavy rain
description: Livingston's match with Aberdeen is postponed 10 minutes after the game was scheduled to kick off at the Tony Macaroni Arena.

title: Coronavirus: British tourist blamed for Lauberhorn ski race cancellation
description: The famous Lauberhorn ski event is cancelled after a spike in Covid-19 cases linked to one tourist.

title: Uncle Roger comedian deletes video with China critic
description: Nigel Ng, who is known for his food videos, said he had not known his colleague's political views.

title: Covid in Wales: How the country is coping - in six charts
description: Nearly a month into the latest lockdown, here is the Covid-19 picture in Wales.

title: Covid: Jonathan Van-Tam answers your questions on Zoom
description: England’s deputy chief medical officer took questions from Radio 1 Newsbeat listeners.

title: Woman has nans as bridesmaids after Covid rules hit wedding
description: When Megan had to scale back plans for ten bridesmaids, Gillian, 80, and Mary, 90, stepped in.

title: Gurlitt's last Nazi-looted work returned to owners
description: The last of 14 works identified as looted from Jewish collectors is returned to the owner's heirs.

title: Covid-19: UK daily deaths at record high and Scotland rules tightened
description: Five things you need to know about the coronavirus pandemic this Wednesday evening.

title: Call for better coronavirus masks for all medical staff
description: Doctors leaders' want staff to be given the type of high-quality masks usually only worn in intensive care.

title: Tower of London's 'queen' raven Merlina missing
description: According to legend, at least six ravens must be kept at the Tower or it will fall.

title: Covid: Are we following the government's stay-at-home message?
description: The government is urging us to stay at home during the lockdown but are we?

title: Covid in Scotland: Tightening of lockdown rules announced
description: Restrictions around takeaway food and click-and-collect services in Scotland are to be toughened.

title: Polly and Molly the jumping piglets
description: The playful pair have learnt a new trick in lockdown, which is melting hearts.

title: NBA: LeBron James makes 'no-look' three pointer for LA Lakers
description: Watch LA Lakers star LeBron James make an incredible 'no-look' three-pointer during his side's 117-100 win over the Houston Rockets.

title: Amputee ballet dancer appeals for 'en pointe' prosthetic foot
description: Pollyanna Hope, who lost her leg in an accident, appeals for a new prosthetic limb on social media.

title: GCSE and A-level pupils could sit mini exams to aid grading
description: Education Secretary Gavin Williamson said this would help teachers to decide "deserved grades".

title: Covid-19: Breaking down Asian vaccine myths in Lancashire
description: How children of South Asian families are helping to overcome misinformation about the Covid-19 vaccine.

title: Lisa Montgomery: Looking for answers in the life of a killer
description: Lisa Montgomery's lawyers argued she was a mentally ill victim of abuse who deserved mercy, but her victim's community said otherwise.

title: The teenage Scot who plays the young Wonder Woman
description: Lilly Aspell not only plays the young heroine but also performs most of her own stunts in the new film.

title: Stroud GP vaccinates her father against Covid-19
description: A GP in Stroud has been able to vaccinate her father, and see him for the first time since March.

title: Palmeiras 0-2 River Plate: Palmeiras into Copa Libertadores final after thriller
description: Watch highlights as Palmeiras reach the Copa Libertadores final - with River Plate denied a goal and two penalties in the second leg of the semi-final.

title: Drill and rap music on trial
description: The BBC's Steve Swann looks at the use of UK drill music as evidence in criminal prosecutions.

title: Gavin Williamson: How has he survived?
description: How has the education secretary survived so many U-turns? Or has he been unfairly accused?

title: Mental Health Act: 'I was sectioned and no one told me what was going on'

title: Huawei patent mentions use of Uighur-spotting tech
description: The company denies selling technology that can identify the ethnic group and plans to reword the patent.
